sections.heading: Violations; assumption of risk
sections.text: The continuance by any person in the employ of any such operator shall not be deemed an assumption of the risks of such employment.SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. IV, art. IV, ยง 19, p. 562;C.S.1922, ยง 7700;C.S.1929, ยง 48-419;R.S.1943, ยง 48-423.Cross ReferencesActions aga
